00071 /* ****************************** MIRROR **************** */
00072 
00073 void EDBM_select_mirrored(Object *UNUSED(obedit), BMEditMesh *em, int extend)
00074 {
00075     BMVert *v1, *v2;
00076     BMIter iter;
00077 
00078     BM_ITER_MESH (v1, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00079         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(v1, BM_ELEM_SELECT) || BM_elem_flag_test(v1, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00080             BM_elem_flag_disable(v1, BM_ELEM_TAG);
00081         }
00082         else {
00083             BM_elem_flag_enable(v1, BM_ELEM_TAG);
00084         }
00085     }
00086 
00087     EDBM_verts_mirror_cache_begin(em, TRUE);
00088 
00089     if (!extend)
00090         EDBM_flag_disable_all(em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00091 
00092     BM_ITER_MESH (v1, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00093         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(v1, BM_ELEM_TAG) || BM_elem_flag_test(v1, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN))
00094             continue;
00095 
00096         v2 = EDBM_verts_mirror_get(em, v1);
00097         if (v2 && !BM_elem_flag_test(v2, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00098             BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, v2, TRUE);
00099         }
00100     }
00101 
00102     EDBM_verts_mirror_cache_end(em);
00103 }

00105 void EDBM_automerge(Scene *scene, Object *obedit, int update)
00106 {
00107     BMEditMesh *em;
00108     
00109     if ((scene->toolsettings->automerge) &&
00110         (obedit && obedit->type == OB_MESH))
00111     {
00112         em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00113         if (!em)
00114             return;
00115 
00116         BMO_op_callf(em->bm, "automerge verts=%hv dist=%f", BM_ELEM_SELECT, scene->toolsettings->doublimit);
00117         if (update) {
00118             DAG_id_tag_update(obedit->data, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00119             BMEdit_RecalcTessellation(em);
00120         }
00121     }
00122 }

00126 unsigned int bm_solidoffs = 0, bm_wireoffs = 0, bm_vertoffs = 0;    /* set in drawobject.c ... for colorindices */

00128 /* facilities for border select and circle select */

00131 /* opengl doesn't support concave... */
00132 static void draw_triangulated(int mcords[][2], short tot)
00133 {
00134     ListBase lb = {NULL, NULL};
00135     DispList *dl;
00136     float *fp;
00137     int a;
00138     
00139     /* make displist */
00140     dl = MEM_callocN(sizeof(DispList), "poly disp");
00141     dl->type = DL_POLY;
00142     dl->parts = 1;
00143     dl->nr = tot;
00144     dl->verts = fp = MEM_callocN(tot * 3 * sizeof(float), "poly verts");
00145     BLI_addtail(&lb, dl);
00146     
00147     for (a = 0; a < tot; a++, fp += 3) {
00148         fp[0] = (float)mcords[a][0];
00149         fp[1] = (float)mcords[a][1];
00150     }
00151     
00152     /* do the fill */
00153     filldisplist(&lb, &lb, 0);
00154 
00155     /* do the draw */
00156     dl = lb.first;  /* filldisplist adds in head of list */
00157     if (dl->type == DL_INDEX3) {
00158         int *index;
00159         
00160         a = dl->parts;
00161         fp = dl->verts;
00162         index = dl->index;
00163         glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00164         while (a--) {
00165             glVertex3fv(fp + 3 * index[0]);
00166             glVertex3fv(fp + 3 * index[1]);
00167             glVertex3fv(fp + 3 * index[2]);
00168             index += 3;
00169         }
00170         glEnd();
00171     }
00172     
00173     freedisplist(&lb);
00174 }

00177 /* reads rect, and builds selection array for quick lookup */
00178 /* returns if all is OK */
00179 int EDBM_backbuf_border_init(ViewContext *vc, short xmin, short ymin, short xmax, short ymax)
00180 {
00181     struct ImBuf *buf;
00182     unsigned int *dr;
00183     int a;
00184     
00185     if (vc->obedit == NULL || vc->v3d->drawtype < OB_SOLID || (vc->v3d->flag & V3D_ZBUF_SELECT) == 0) {
00186         return 0;
00187     }
00188     
00189     buf = view3d_read_backbuf(vc, xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax);
00190     if (buf == NULL) return 0;
00191     if (bm_vertoffs == 0) return 0;
00192 
00193     dr = buf->rect;
00194     
00195     /* build selection lookup */
00196     selbuf = MEM_callocN(bm_vertoffs + 1, "selbuf");
00197     
00198     a = (xmax - xmin + 1) * (ymax - ymin + 1);
00199     while (a--) {
00200         if (*dr > 0 && *dr <= bm_vertoffs)
00201             selbuf[*dr] = 1;
00202         dr++;
00203     }
00204     IMB_freeImBuf(buf);
00205     return 1;
00206 }
00207 
00208 int EDBM_backbuf_check(unsigned int index)
00209 {
00210     if (selbuf == NULL) return 1;
00211     if (index > 0 && index <= bm_vertoffs)
00212         return selbuf[index];
00213     return 0;
00214 }
00215 
00216 void EDBM_backbuf_free(void)
00217 {
00218     if (selbuf) MEM_freeN(selbuf);
00219     selbuf = NULL;
00220 }

00222 /* mcords is a polygon mask
00223  * - grab backbuffer,
00224  * - draw with black in backbuffer, 
00225  * - grab again and compare
00226  * returns 'OK' 
00227  */
00228 int EDBM_backbuf_border_mask_init(ViewContext *vc, int mcords[][2], short tot, short xmin, short ymin, short xmax, short ymax)
00229 {
00230     unsigned int *dr, *drm;
00231     struct ImBuf *buf, *bufmask;
00232     int a;
00233     
00234     /* method in use for face selecting too */
00235     if (vc->obedit == NULL) {
00236         if (!(paint_facesel_test(vc->obact) || paint_vertsel_test(vc->obact))) {
00237             return 0;
00238         }
00239     }
00240     else if (vc->v3d->drawtype < OB_SOLID || (vc->v3d->flag & V3D_ZBUF_SELECT) == 0) {
00241         return 0;
00242     }
00243 
00244     buf = view3d_read_backbuf(vc, xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax);
00245     if (buf == NULL) return 0;
00246     if (bm_vertoffs == 0) return 0;
00247 
00248     dr = buf->rect;
00249 
00250     /* draw the mask */
00251     glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00252     
00253     glColor3ub(0, 0, 0);
00254     
00255     /* yah, opengl doesn't do concave... tsk! */
00256     ED_region_pixelspace(vc->ar);
00257     draw_triangulated(mcords, tot);
00258     
00259     glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);  /* for zero sized masks, lines */
00260     for (a = 0; a < tot; a++) {
00261         glVertex2iv(mcords[a]);
00262     }
00263     glEnd();
00264     
00265     glFinish(); /* to be sure readpixels sees mask */
00266     
00267     /* grab mask */
00268     bufmask = view3d_read_backbuf(vc, xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax);
00269     drm = bufmask->rect;
00270     if (bufmask == NULL) {
00271         return 0; /* only when mem alloc fails, go crash somewhere else! */
00272     }
00273     
00274     /* build selection lookup */
00275     selbuf = MEM_callocN(bm_vertoffs + 1, "selbuf");
00276     
00277     a = (xmax - xmin + 1) * (ymax - ymin + 1);
00278     while (a--) {
00279         if (*dr > 0 && *dr <= bm_vertoffs && *drm == 0) selbuf[*dr] = 1;
00280         dr++; drm++;
00281     }
00282     IMB_freeImBuf(buf);
00283     IMB_freeImBuf(bufmask);
00284 
00285     return 1;
00286 }
00287 
00288 /* circle shaped sample area */
00289 int EDBM_backbuf_circle_init(ViewContext *vc, short xs, short ys, short rads)
00290 {
00291     struct ImBuf *buf;
00292     unsigned int *dr;
00293     short xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax, xc, yc;
00294     int radsq;
00295     
00296     /* method in use for face selecting too */
00297     if (vc->obedit == NULL) {
00298         if (!(paint_facesel_test(vc->obact) || paint_vertsel_test(vc->obact))) {
00299             return 0;
00300         }
00301     }
00302     else if (vc->v3d->drawtype < OB_SOLID || (vc->v3d->flag & V3D_ZBUF_SELECT) == 0) return 0;
00303     
00304     xmin = xs - rads; xmax = xs + rads;
00305     ymin = ys - rads; ymax = ys + rads;
00306     buf = view3d_read_backbuf(vc, xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax);
00307     if (bm_vertoffs == 0) return 0;
00308     if (buf == NULL) return 0;
00309 
00310     dr = buf->rect;
00311     
00312     /* build selection lookup */
00313     selbuf = MEM_callocN(bm_vertoffs + 1, "selbuf");
00314     radsq = rads * rads;
00315     for (yc = -rads; yc <= rads; yc++) {
00316         for (xc = -rads; xc <= rads; xc++, dr++) {
00317             if (xc * xc + yc * yc < radsq) {
00318                 if (*dr > 0 && *dr <= bm_vertoffs) selbuf[*dr] = 1;
00319             }
00320         }
00321     }
00322 
00323     IMB_freeImBuf(buf);
00324     return 1;
00325     
00326 }
00327 
00328 static void findnearestvert__doClosest(void *userData, BMVert *eve, int x, int y, int index)
00329 {
00330     struct { short mval[2], pass, select, strict; int dist, lastIndex, closestIndex; BMVert *closest; } *data = userData;
00331 
00332     if (data->pass == 0) {
00333         if (index <= data->lastIndex)
00334             return;
00335     }
00336     else {
00337         if (index > data->lastIndex)
00338             return;
00339     }
00340 
00341     if (data->dist > 3) {
00342         int temp = abs(data->mval[0] - x) + abs(data->mval[1] - y);
00343         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT) == data->select) {
00344             if (data->strict == 1) {
00345                 return;
00346             }
00347             else {
00348                 temp += 5;
00349             }
00350         }
00351 
00352         if (temp < data->dist) {
00353             data->dist = temp;
00354             data->closest = eve;
00355             data->closestIndex = index;
00356         }
00357     }
00358 }

00363 static unsigned int findnearestvert__backbufIndextest(void *handle, unsigned int index)
00364 {
00365     BMEditMesh *em = (BMEditMesh *)handle;
00366     BMVert *eve = BM_vert_at_index(em->bm, index - 1);
00367 
00368     if (eve && BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) return 0;
00369     return 1;
00370 }
00380 BMVert *EDBM_vert_find_nearest(ViewContext *vc, int *dist, short sel, short strict)
00381 {
00382     if (vc->v3d->drawtype > OB_WIRE && (vc->v3d->flag & V3D_ZBUF_SELECT)) {
00383         int distance;
00384         unsigned int index;
00385         BMVert *eve;
00386         
00387         if (strict) {
00388             index = view3d_sample_backbuf_rect(vc, vc->mval, 50, bm_wireoffs, 0xFFFFFF, &distance,
00389                                                strict, vc->em, findnearestvert__backbufIndextest);
00390         }
00391         else {
00392             index = view3d_sample_backbuf_rect(vc, vc->mval, 50, bm_wireoffs, 0xFFFFFF, &distance,
00393                                                0, NULL, NULL);
00394         }
00395         
00396         eve = BM_vert_at_index(vc->em->bm, index - 1);
00397         
00398         if (eve && distance < *dist) {
00399             *dist = distance;
00400             return eve;
00401         }
00402         else {
00403             return NULL;
00404         }
00405             
00406     }
00407     else {
00408         struct { short mval[2], pass, select, strict; int dist, lastIndex, closestIndex; BMVert *closest; } data;
00409         static int lastSelectedIndex = 0;
00410         static BMVert *lastSelected = NULL;
00411         
00412         if (lastSelected && BM_vert_at_index(vc->em->bm, lastSelectedIndex) != lastSelected) {
00413             lastSelectedIndex = 0;
00414             lastSelected = NULL;
00415         }
00416 
00417         data.lastIndex = lastSelectedIndex;
00418         data.mval[0] = vc->mval[0];
00419         data.mval[1] = vc->mval[1];
00420         data.select = sel;
00421         data.dist = *dist;
00422         data.strict = strict;
00423         data.closest = NULL;
00424         data.closestIndex = 0;
00425 
00426         data.pass = 0;
00427 
00428         ED_view3d_init_mats_rv3d(vc->obedit, vc->rv3d);
00429 
00430         mesh_foreachScreenVert(vc, findnearestvert__doClosest, &data, V3D_CLIP_TEST_RV3D_CLIPPING);
00431 
00432         if (data.dist > 3) {
00433             data.pass = 1;
00434             mesh_foreachScreenVert(vc, findnearestvert__doClosest, &data, V3D_CLIP_TEST_RV3D_CLIPPING);
00435         }
00436 
00437         *dist = data.dist;
00438         lastSelected = data.closest;
00439         lastSelectedIndex = data.closestIndex;
00440 
00441         return data.closest;
00442     }
00443 }
00444 
00445 /* returns labda for closest distance v1 to line-piece v2 - v3 */
00446 float labda_PdistVL2Dfl(const float v1[3], const float v2[3], const float v3[3])
00447 {
00448     float rc[2], len;
00449     
00450     rc[0] = v3[0] - v2[0];
00451     rc[1] = v3[1] - v2[1];
00452     len = rc[0] * rc[0] + rc[1] * rc[1];
00453     if (len == 0.0f)
00454         return 0.0f;
00455     
00456     return (rc[0] * (v1[0] - v2[0]) + rc[1] * (v1[1] - v2[1])) / len;
00457 }
00458 
00459 /* note; uses v3d, so needs active 3d window */
00460 static void findnearestedge__doClosest(void *userData, BMEdge *eed, int x0, int y0, int x1, int y1, int UNUSED(index))
00461 {
00462     struct { ViewContext vc; float mval[2]; int dist; BMEdge *closest; } *data = userData;
00463     float v1[2], v2[2];
00464     int distance;
00465         
00466     v1[0] = x0;
00467     v1[1] = y0;
00468     v2[0] = x1;
00469     v2[1] = y1;
00470         
00471     distance = dist_to_line_segment_v2(data->mval, v1, v2);
00472         
00473     if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00474         distance += 5;
00475     }
00476 
00477     if (distance < data->dist) {
00478         if (data->vc.rv3d->rflag & RV3D_CLIPPING) {
00479             float labda = labda_PdistVL2Dfl(data->mval, v1, v2);
00480             float vec[3];
00481 
00482             vec[0] = eed->v1->co[0] + labda * (eed->v2->co[0] - eed->v1->co[0]);
00483             vec[1] = eed->v1->co[1] + labda * (eed->v2->co[1] - eed->v1->co[1]);
00484             vec[2] = eed->v1->co[2] + labda * (eed->v2->co[2] - eed->v1->co[2]);
00485             mul_m4_v3(data->vc.obedit->obmat, vec);
00486 
00487             if (ED_view3d_clipping_test(data->vc.rv3d, vec, TRUE) == 0) {
00488                 data->dist = distance;
00489                 data->closest = eed;
00490             }
00491         }
00492         else {
00493             data->dist = distance;
00494             data->closest = eed;
00495         }
00496     }
00497 }
00498 BMEdge *EDBM_edge_find_nearest(ViewContext *vc, int *dist)
00499 {
00500 
00501     if (vc->v3d->drawtype > OB_WIRE && (vc->v3d->flag & V3D_ZBUF_SELECT)) {
00502         int distance;
00503         unsigned int index;
00504         BMEdge *eed;
00505         
00506         view3d_validate_backbuf(vc);
00507         
00508         index = view3d_sample_backbuf_rect(vc, vc->mval, 50, bm_solidoffs, bm_wireoffs, &distance, 0, NULL, NULL);
00509         eed = BM_edge_at_index(vc->em->bm, index - 1);
00510         
00511         if (eed && distance < *dist) {
00512             *dist = distance;
00513             return eed;
00514         }
00515         else {
00516             return NULL;
00517         }
00518     }
00519     else {
00520         struct { ViewContext vc; float mval[2]; int dist; BMEdge *closest; } data;
00521 
00522         data.vc = *vc;
00523         data.mval[0] = vc->mval[0];
00524         data.mval[1] = vc->mval[1];
00525         data.dist = *dist;
00526         data.closest = NULL;
00527         ED_view3d_init_mats_rv3d(vc->obedit, vc->rv3d);
00528 
00529         mesh_foreachScreenEdge(vc, findnearestedge__doClosest, &data, 2);
00530 
00531         *dist = data.dist;
00532         return data.closest;
00533     }
00534 }
00535 
00536 static void findnearestface__getDistance(void *userData, BMFace *efa, int x, int y, int UNUSED(index))
00537 {
00538     struct { short mval[2]; int dist; BMFace *toFace; } *data = userData;
00539 
00540     if (efa == data->toFace) {
00541         int temp = abs(data->mval[0] - x) + abs(data->mval[1] - y);
00542 
00543         if (temp < data->dist)
00544             data->dist = temp;
00545     }
00546 }
00547 static void findnearestface__doClosest(void *userData, BMFace *efa, int x, int y, int index)
00548 {
00549     struct { short mval[2], pass; int dist, lastIndex, closestIndex; BMFace *closest; } *data = userData;
00550 
00551     if (data->pass == 0) {
00552         if (index <= data->lastIndex)
00553             return;
00554     }
00555     else {
00556         if (index > data->lastIndex)
00557             return;
00558     }
00559 
00560     if (data->dist > 3) {
00561         int temp = abs(data->mval[0] - x) + abs(data->mval[1] - y);
00562 
00563         if (temp < data->dist) {
00564             data->dist = temp;
00565             data->closest = efa;
00566             data->closestIndex = index;
00567         }
00568     }
00569 }
00570 
00571 BMFace *EDBM_face_find_nearest(ViewContext *vc, int *dist)
00572 {
00573 
00574     if (vc->v3d->drawtype > OB_WIRE && (vc->v3d->flag & V3D_ZBUF_SELECT)) {
00575         unsigned int index;
00576         BMFace *efa;
00577 
00578         view3d_validate_backbuf(vc);
00579 
00580         index = view3d_sample_backbuf(vc, vc->mval[0], vc->mval[1]);
00581         efa = BM_face_at_index(vc->em->bm, index - 1);
00582         
00583         if (efa) {
00584             struct { short mval[2]; int dist; BMFace *toFace; } data;
00585 
00586             data.mval[0] = vc->mval[0];
00587             data.mval[1] = vc->mval[1];
00588             data.dist = 0x7FFF;     /* largest short */
00589             data.toFace = efa;
00590 
00591             mesh_foreachScreenFace(vc, findnearestface__getDistance, &data);
00592 
00593             if (vc->em->selectmode == SCE_SELECT_FACE || data.dist < *dist) {   /* only faces, no dist check */
00594                 *dist = data.dist;
00595                 return efa;
00596             }
00597         }
00598         
00599         return NULL;
00600     }
00601     else {
00602         struct { short mval[2], pass; int dist, lastIndex, closestIndex; BMFace *closest; } data;
00603         static int lastSelectedIndex = 0;
00604         static BMFace *lastSelected = NULL;
00605 
00606         if (lastSelected && BM_face_at_index(vc->em->bm, lastSelectedIndex) != lastSelected) {
00607             lastSelectedIndex = 0;
00608             lastSelected = NULL;
00609         }
00610 
00611         data.lastIndex = lastSelectedIndex;
00612         data.mval[0] = vc->mval[0];
00613         data.mval[1] = vc->mval[1];
00614         data.dist = *dist;
00615         data.closest = NULL;
00616         data.closestIndex = 0;
00617         ED_view3d_init_mats_rv3d(vc->obedit, vc->rv3d);
00618 
00619         data.pass = 0;
00620         mesh_foreachScreenFace(vc, findnearestface__doClosest, &data);
00621 
00622         if (data.dist > 3) {
00623             data.pass = 1;
00624             ED_view3d_init_mats_rv3d(vc->obedit, vc->rv3d);
00625             mesh_foreachScreenFace(vc, findnearestface__doClosest, &data);
00626         }
00627 
00628         *dist = data.dist;
00629         lastSelected = data.closest;
00630         lastSelectedIndex = data.closestIndex;
00631 
00632         return data.closest;
00633     }
00634 }
00635 
00636 /* best distance based on screen coords. 
00637  * use em->selectmode to define how to use 
00638  * selected vertices and edges get disadvantage
00639  * return 1 if found one
00640  */
00641 static int unified_findnearest(ViewContext *vc, BMVert **r_eve, BMEdge **r_eed, BMFace **r_efa)
00642 {
00643     BMEditMesh *em = vc->em;
00644     int dist = 75;
00645     
00646     *r_eve = NULL;
00647     *r_eed = NULL;
00648     *r_efa = NULL;
00649     
00650     /* no afterqueue (yet), so we check it now, otherwise the em_xxxofs indices are bad */
00651     view3d_validate_backbuf(vc);
00652     
00653     if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX)
00654         *r_eve = EDBM_vert_find_nearest(vc, &dist, BM_ELEM_SELECT, 0);
00655     if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE)
00656         *r_efa = EDBM_face_find_nearest(vc, &dist);
00657 
00658     dist -= 20; /* since edges select lines, we give dots advantage of 20 pix */
00659     if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE)
00660         *r_eed = EDBM_edge_find_nearest(vc, &dist);
00661 
00662     /* return only one of 3 pointers, for frontbuffer redraws */
00663     if (*r_eed) {
00664         *r_efa = NULL; *r_eve = NULL;
00665     }
00666     else if (*r_efa) {
00667         *r_eve = NULL;
00668     }
00669     
00670     return (*r_eve || *r_eed || *r_efa);
00671 }
00672

00678     {SIMVERT_VGROUP, "VGROUP", 0, "Vertex Groups", ""},
00679 
00680     {SIMEDGE_LENGTH, "LENGTH", 0, "Length", ""},
00681     {SIMEDGE_DIR, "DIR", 0, "Direction", ""},
00682     {SIMEDGE_FACE, "FACE", 0, "Amount of Faces Around an Edge", ""},
00683     {SIMEDGE_FACE_ANGLE, "FACE_ANGLE", 0, "Face Angles", ""},
00684     {SIMEDGE_CREASE, "CREASE", 0, "Crease", ""},
00685     {SIMEDGE_SEAM, "SEAM", 0, "Seam", ""},
00686     {SIMEDGE_SHARP, "SHARP", 0, "Sharpness", ""},
00687 
00688     {SIMFACE_MATERIAL, "MATERIAL", 0, "Material", ""},
00689     {SIMFACE_IMAGE, "IMAGE", 0, "Image", ""},
00690     {SIMFACE_AREA, "AREA", 0, "Area", ""},
00691     {SIMFACE_PERIMETER, "PERIMETER", 0, "Perimeter", ""},
00692     {SIMFACE_NORMAL, "NORMAL", 0, "Normal", ""},
00693     {SIMFACE_COPLANAR, "COPLANAR", 0, "Co-planar", ""},
00694 
00695     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00696 };

00698 /* selects new faces/edges/verts based on the existing selection */
00699 
00700 static int similar_face_select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00701 {
00702     Object *ob = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00703     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(ob);
00704     BMOperator bmop;
00705 
00706     /* get the type from RNA */
00707     int type = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00708     float thresh = RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "threshold");
00709 
00710     /* initialize the bmop using EDBM api, which does various ui error reporting and other stuff */
00711     EDBM_op_init(em, &bmop, op, "similarfaces faces=%hf type=%i thresh=%f", BM_ELEM_SELECT, type, thresh);
00712 
00713     /* execute the operator */
00714     BMO_op_exec(em->bm, &bmop);
00715 
00716     /* clear the existing selection */
00717     EDBM_flag_disable_all(em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00718 
00719     /* select the output */
00720     BMO_slot_buffer_hflag_enable(em->bm, &bmop, "faceout", BM_ALL, BM_ELEM_SELECT, TRUE);
00721 
00722     /* finish the operator */
00723     if (!EDBM_op_finish(em, &bmop, op, TRUE)) {
00724         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00725     }
00726 
00727     EDBM_update_generic(C, em, FALSE);
00728 
00729     /* we succeeded */
00730     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00731 }   
00732

00735 /* EDGE GROUP */
00736 
00737 /* wrap the above function but do selection flushing edge to face */
00738 static int similar_edge_select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00739 {
00740     Object *ob = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00741     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(ob);
00742     BMOperator bmop;
00743 
00744     /* get the type from RNA */
00745     int type = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00746     float thresh = RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "threshold");
00747 
00748     /* initialize the bmop using EDBM api, which does various ui error reporting and other stuff */
00749     EDBM_op_init(em, &bmop, op, "similaredges edges=%he type=%i thresh=%f", BM_ELEM_SELECT, type, thresh);
00750 
00751     /* execute the operator */
00752     BMO_op_exec(em->bm, &bmop);
00753 
00754     /* clear the existing selection */
00755     EDBM_flag_disable_all(em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00756 
00757     /* select the output */
00758     BMO_slot_buffer_hflag_enable(em->bm, &bmop, "edgeout", BM_ALL, BM_ELEM_SELECT, TRUE);
00759     EDBM_selectmode_flush(em);
00760 
00761     /* finish the operator */
00762     if (!EDBM_op_finish(em, &bmop, op, TRUE)) {
00763         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00764     }
00765 
00766     EDBM_update_generic(C, em, FALSE);
00767 
00768     /* we succeeded */
00769     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00770 }

00774 /*
00775  * VERT GROUP
00776  * mode 1: same normal
00777  * mode 2: same number of face users
00778  * mode 3: same vertex groups
00779  */
00780 static int similar_vert_select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00781 {
00782     Object *ob = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00783     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(ob);
00784     BMOperator bmop;
00785     /* get the type from RNA */
00786     int type = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00787     float thresh = RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "threshold");
00788 
00789     /* initialize the bmop using EDBM api, which does various ui error reporting and other stuff */
00790     EDBM_op_init(em, &bmop, op, "similarverts verts=%hv type=%i thresh=%f", BM_ELEM_SELECT, type, thresh);
00791 
00792     /* execute the operator */
00793     BMO_op_exec(em->bm, &bmop);
00794 
00795     /* clear the existing selection */
00796     EDBM_flag_disable_all(em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00797 
00798     /* select the output */
00799     BMO_slot_buffer_hflag_enable(em->bm, &bmop, "vertout", BM_ALL, BM_ELEM_SELECT, TRUE);
00800 
00801     /* finish the operator */
00802     if (!EDBM_op_finish(em, &bmop, op, TRUE)) {
00803         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00804     }
00805 
00806     EDBM_selectmode_flush(em);
00807 
00808     EDBM_update_generic(C, em, FALSE);
00809 
00810     /* we succeeded */
00811     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00812 }
00813 
00814 static int edbm_select_similar_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00815 {
00816     ToolSettings *ts = CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
00817     PropertyRNA *prop = RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "threshold");
00818 
00819     int type = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00820 
00821     if (!RNA_property_is_set(op->ptr, prop)) {
00822         RNA_property_float_set(op->ptr, prop, ts->select_thresh);
00823     }
00824     else {
00825         ts->select_thresh = RNA_property_float_get(op->ptr, prop);
00826     }
00827 
00828     if      (type < 100) return similar_vert_select_exec(C, op);
00829     else if (type < 200) return similar_edge_select_exec(C, op);
00830     else return similar_face_select_exec(C, op);
00831 }
00832 
00833 static EnumPropertyItem *select_similar_type_itemf(bContext *C, PointerRNA *UNUSED(ptr), PropertyRNA *UNUSED(prop),
00834                                                    int *free)
00835 {
00836     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00837 
00838     if (obedit && obedit->type == OB_MESH) {
00839         EnumPropertyItem *item = NULL;
00840         int a, totitem = 0;
00841         BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00842 
00843         if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
00844             for (a = SIMVERT_NORMAL; a < SIMEDGE_LENGTH; a++) {
00845                 RNA_enum_items_add_value(&item, &totitem, prop_similar_types, a);
00846             }
00847         }
00848         else if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
00849             for (a = SIMEDGE_LENGTH; a < SIMFACE_MATERIAL; a++) {
00850                 RNA_enum_items_add_value(&item, &totitem, prop_similar_types, a);
00851             }
00852         }
00853         else if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
00854             for (a = SIMFACE_MATERIAL; a <= SIMFACE_COPLANAR; a++) {
00855                 RNA_enum_items_add_value(&item, &totitem, prop_similar_types, a);
00856             }
00857         }
00858         RNA_enum_item_end(&item, &totitem);
00859 
00860         *free = 1;
00861 
00862         return item;
00863     }
00864     
00865     return NULL;
00866 }
00867 
00868 void MESH_OT_select_similar(wmOperatorType *ot)
00869 {
00870     PropertyRNA *prop;
00871 
00872     /* identifiers */
00873     ot->name = "Select Similar";
00874     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_select_similar";
00875     ot->description = "Select similar vertices, edges or faces by property types";
00876     
00877     /* api callbacks */
00878     ot->invoke = WM_menu_invoke;
00879     ot->exec = edbm_select_similar_exec;
00880     ot->poll = ED_operator_editmesh;
00881     
00882     /* flags */
00883     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00884     
00885     /* properties */
00886     prop = ot->prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", prop_similar_types, SIMVERT_NORMAL, "Type", "");
00887     RNA_def_enum_funcs(prop, select_similar_type_itemf);
00888 
00889     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "threshold", 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, "Threshold", "", 0.01, 1.0);
00890 }
00891 
00892 /* ***************************************************** */
00893 
00894 /* ****************  LOOP SELECTS *************** */
00895 
00896 static void walker_select(BMEditMesh *em, int walkercode, void *start, int select)
00897 {
00898     BMesh *bm = em->bm;
00899     BMElem *ele;
00900     BMWalker walker;
00901 
00902     BMW_init(&walker, bm, walkercode,
00903              BMW_MASK_NOP, BMW_MASK_NOP, BMW_MASK_NOP,
00904              BMW_FLAG_TEST_HIDDEN,
00905              BMW_NIL_LAY);
00906     ele = BMW_begin(&walker, start);
00907     for (; ele; ele = BMW_step(&walker)) {
00908         if (!select) {
00909             BM_select_history_remove(bm, ele);
00910         }
00911         BM_elem_select_set(bm, ele, select);
00912     }
00913     BMW_end(&walker);
00914 }
00915 
00916 static int edbm_loop_multiselect_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00917 {
00918     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00919     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00920     BMEdge *eed;
00921     BMEdge **edarray;
00922     int edindex;
00923     int looptype = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "ring");
00924     
00925     BMIter iter;
00926     int totedgesel = 0;
00927 
00928     for (eed = BM_iter_new(&iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL);
00929          eed; eed = BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00930 
00931         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00932             totedgesel++;
00933         }
00934     }
00935 
00936     
00937     edarray = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(BMEdge *) * totedgesel, "edge array");
00938     edindex = 0;
00939     
00940     for (eed = BM_iter_new(&iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL);
00941          eed;
00942          eed = BM_iter_step(&iter))
00943     {
00944 
00945         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00946             edarray[edindex] = eed;
00947             edindex++;
00948         }
00949     }
00950     
00951     if (looptype) {
00952         for (edindex = 0; edindex < totedgesel; edindex += 1) {
00953             eed = edarray[edindex];
00954             walker_select(em, BMW_EDGERING, eed, TRUE);
00955         }
00956         EDBM_selectmode_flush(em);
00957     }
00958     else {
00959         for (edindex = 0; edindex < totedgesel; edindex += 1) {
00960             eed = edarray[edindex];
00961             walker_select(em, BMW_LOOP, eed, TRUE);
00962         }
00963         EDBM_selectmode_flush(em);
00964     }
00965     MEM_freeN(edarray);
00966 //  if (EM_texFaceCheck())
00967     
00968     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit);
00969 
00970     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00971 }
00972 
00973 void MESH_OT_loop_multi_select(wmOperatorType *ot)
00974 {
00975     /* identifiers */
00976     ot->name = "Multi Select Loops";
00977     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_loop_multi_select";
00978     ot->description = "Select a loop of connected edges by connection type";
00979     
00980     /* api callbacks */
00981     ot->exec = edbm_loop_multiselect_exec;
00982     ot->poll = ED_operator_editmesh;
00983     
00984     /* flags */
00985     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00986     
00987     /* properties */
00988     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "ring", 0, "Ring", "");
00989 }
00990 
00991         
00992 /* ***************** MAIN MOUSE SELECTION ************** */
00993 
00994 
00995 /* ***************** loop select (non modal) ************** */
00996 
00997 static void mouse_mesh_loop(bContext *C, int mval[2], short extend, short ring)
00998 {
00999     ViewContext vc;
01000     BMEditMesh *em;
01001     BMEdge *eed;
01002     int select = TRUE;
01003     int dist = 50;
01004     
01005     em_setup_viewcontext(C, &vc);
01006     vc.mval[0] = mval[0];
01007     vc.mval[1] = mval[1];
01008     em = vc.em;
01009     
01010     /* no afterqueue (yet), so we check it now, otherwise the bm_xxxofs indices are bad */
01011     view3d_validate_backbuf(&vc);
01012 
01013     eed = EDBM_edge_find_nearest(&vc, &dist);
01014     if (eed) {
01015         if (extend == 0) {
01016             EDBM_flag_disable_all(em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
01017         }
01018     
01019         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT) == 0) {
01020             select = TRUE;
01021         }
01022         else if (extend) {
01023             select = FALSE;
01024         }
01025 
01026         if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
01027             walker_select(em, BMW_FACELOOP, eed, select);
01028         }
01029         else if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
01030             if (ring)
01031                 walker_select(em, BMW_EDGERING, eed, select);
01032             else
01033                 walker_select(em, BMW_LOOP, eed, select);
01034         }
01035         else if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
01036             if (ring)
01037                 walker_select(em, BMW_EDGERING, eed, select);
01038 
01039             else
01040                 walker_select(em, BMW_LOOP, eed, select);
01041         }
01042 
01043         EDBM_selectmode_flush(em);
01044 //          if (EM_texFaceCheck())
01045         
01046         /* sets as active, useful for other tools */
01047         if (select) {
01048             if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
01049                 /* TODO: would be nice if the edge vertex chosen here
01050                  * was the one closer to the selection pointer, instead
01051                  * of arbitrarily selecting the first one */
01052                 BM_select_history_store(em->bm, eed->v1);
01053             }
01054             else if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
01055                 BM_select_history_store(em->bm, eed);
01056             }
01057             /* TODO: would be nice if the nearest face that
01058              * belongs to the selected edge could be set to
01059              * active here in face select mode */
01060         }
01061 
01062         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, vc.obedit);
01063     }
01064 }
01065 
01066 static int edbm_select_loop_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
01067 {
01068     
01069     view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
01070     
01071     mouse_mesh_loop(C, event->mval, RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend"),
01072                     RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "ring"));
01073     
01074     /* cannot do tweaks for as long this keymap is after transform map */
01075     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01076 }
01077

01081     ot->name = "Loop Select";
01082     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_loop_select";

01084

01094     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "ring", 0, "Select Ring", "Select ring");
01095 }

01114 
01115 /* ******************* edgetag_shortest_path and helpers ****************** */
01116 
01117 static float edgetag_cut_cost(BMEditMesh *UNUSED(em), BMEdge *e1, BMEdge *e2, BMVert *v)
01118 {
01119     BMVert *v1 = (e1->v1 == v) ? e1->v2 : e1->v1;
01120     BMVert *v2 = (e2->v1 == v) ? e2->v2 : e2->v1;
01121     float cost, d1[3], d2[3];
01122 
01123     /* The cost is based on the simple sum of the length of the two edgees... */
01124     sub_v3_v3v3(d1, v->co, v1->co);
01125     sub_v3_v3v3(d2, v2->co, v->co);
01126     cost = len_v3(d1);
01127     cost += len_v3(d2);
01128 
01129     /* but is biased to give higher values to sharp turns, so that it will take
01130      * paths with fewer "turns" when selecting between equal-weighted paths between
01131      * the two edges */
01132     cost = cost + 0.5f * cost * (2.0f - sqrt(fabs(dot_v3v3(d1, d2))));
01133 
01134     return cost;
01135 }
01136 
01137 static void edgetag_add_adjacent(BMEditMesh *em, SmallHash *visithash, Heap *heap, int mednum, int vertnum, 
01138                                  int *nedges, int *edges, int *prevedge, float *cost)
01139 {
01140     BMEdge *e1 = EDBM_edge_at_index(em, mednum);
01141     BMVert *v = EDBM_vert_at_index(em, vertnum);
01142     int startadj, endadj = nedges[vertnum + 1];
01143 
01144     for (startadj = nedges[vertnum]; startadj < endadj; startadj++) {
01145         int adjnum = edges[startadj];
01146         BMEdge *e2 = EDBM_edge_at_index(em, adjnum);
01147         float newcost;
01148         float cutcost;
01149 
01150         if (BLI_smallhash_haskey(visithash, (uintptr_t)e2))
01151             continue;
01152 
01153         cutcost = edgetag_cut_cost(em, e1, e2, v);
01154         newcost = cost[mednum] + cutcost;
01155 
01156         if (cost[adjnum] > newcost) {
01157             cost[adjnum] = newcost;
01158             prevedge[adjnum] = mednum;
01159             BLI_heap_insert(heap, newcost, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(adjnum));
01160         }
01161     }
01162 }
01163 
01164 static void edgetag_context_set(BMEditMesh *em, Scene *scene, BMEdge *e, int val)
01165 {
01166     
01167     switch (scene->toolsettings->edge_mode) {
01168         case EDGE_MODE_SELECT:
01169             BM_edge_select_set(em->bm, e, val);
01170             break;
01171         case EDGE_MODE_TAG_SEAM:
01172             BM_elem_flag_set(e, BM_ELEM_SEAM, val);
01173             break;
01174         case EDGE_MODE_TAG_SHARP:
01175             BM_elem_flag_set(e, BM_ELEM_SMOOTH, !val);
01176             break;
01177         case EDGE_MODE_TAG_CREASE:
01178         {
01179             float *crease = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->edata, e->head.data, CD_CREASE);
01180             *crease = (val) ? 1.0f : 0.0f;
01181             break;
01182         }
01183         case EDGE_MODE_TAG_BEVEL:
01184         {
01185             float *bweight = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->edata, e->head.data, CD_BWEIGHT);
01186             *bweight = (val) ? 1.0f : 0.0f;
01187             break;
01188         }
01189     }
01190 }
01191 
01192 static int edgetag_context_check(Scene *scene, BMEditMesh *em, BMEdge *e)
01193 {
01194     switch (scene->toolsettings->edge_mode) {
01195         case EDGE_MODE_SELECT:
01196             return BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_SELECT) ? 1 : 0;
01197         case EDGE_MODE_TAG_SEAM:
01198             return BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_SEAM);
01199         case EDGE_MODE_TAG_SHARP:
01200             return !BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_SMOOTH);
01201         case EDGE_MODE_TAG_CREASE:
01202             return BM_elem_float_data_get(&em->bm->edata, e, CD_CREASE) ? 1 : 0;
01203         case EDGE_MODE_TAG_BEVEL:
01204             return BM_elem_float_data_get(&em->bm->edata, e, CD_BWEIGHT) ? 1 : 0;
01205     }
01206     return 0;
01207 }
01208 
01209 static int edgetag_shortest_path(Scene *scene, BMEditMesh *em, BMEdge *source, BMEdge *target)
01210 {
01211     BMEdge *e;
01212     BMIter iter;
01213     Heap *heap;
01214     SmallHash visithash;
01215     float *cost;
01216     int i, totvert = 0, totedge = 0, *nedges, *edges, *prevedge, mednum = -1, nedgeswap = 0;
01217     int targetnum;
01218 
01219     BLI_smallhash_init(&visithash);
01220 
01221     /* note, would pass BM_EDGE except we are looping over all edges anyway */
01222     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(em->bm, BM_VERT /* | BM_EDGE */);
01223 
01224     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
01225         if (BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
01226             BLI_smallhash_insert(&visithash, (uintptr_t)e, NULL);
01227         }
01228 
01229         BM_elem_index_set(e, totedge); /* set_inline */
01230         totedge++;
01231     }
01232     em->bm->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_EDGE;
01233 
01234     /* alloc */
01235     totvert = em->bm->totvert;
01236     nedges = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*nedges) * totvert + 1, "SeamPathNEdges");
01237     edges = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*edges) * totedge * 2, "SeamPathEdges");
01238     prevedge = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*prevedge) * totedge, "SeamPathPrevious");
01239     cost = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*cost) * totedge, "SeamPathCost");
01240 
01241     /* count edges, compute adjacent edges offsets and fill adjacent */
01242     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
01243         nedges[BM_elem_index_get(e->v1) + 1]++;
01244         nedges[BM_elem_index_get(e->v2) + 1]++;
01245     }
01246 
01247     for (i = 1; i < totvert; i++) {
01248         int newswap = nedges[i + 1];
01249         nedges[i + 1] = nedgeswap + nedges[i];
01250         nedgeswap = newswap;
01251     }
01252     nedges[0] = nedges[1] = 0;
01253 
01254     i = 0;
01255     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
01256         edges[nedges[BM_elem_index_get(e->v1) + 1]++] = i;
01257         edges[nedges[BM_elem_index_get(e->v2) + 1]++] = i;
01258 
01259         cost[i] = 1e20f;
01260         prevedge[i] = -1;
01261         i++;
01262     }
01263 
01264     /*
01265      * Arrays are now filled as follows:
01266      *
01267      *  nedges[n] = sum of the # of edges incident to all vertices numbered 0 through n - 1
01268      *  edges[edges[n]..edges[n - 1]] = the indices of of the edges incident to vertex n
01269      *
01270      * As the search continues, prevedge[n] will be the previous edge on the shortest
01271      * path found so far to edge n. The visitedhash will of course contain entries
01272      * for edges that have been visited, cost[n] will contain the length of the shortest
01273      * path to edge n found so far, Finally, heap is a priority heap which is built on the
01274      * the same data as the cost arry, but inverted: it is a worklist of edges prioritized
01275      * by the shortest path found so far to the edge.
01276      */
01277 
01278     /* regular dijkstra shortest path, but over edges instead of vertices */
01279     heap = BLI_heap_new();
01280     BLI_heap_insert(heap, 0.0f, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(BM_elem_index_get(source)));
01281     cost[BM_elem_index_get(source)] = 0.0f;
01282     EDBM_index_arrays_init(em, 1, 1, 0);
01283     targetnum = BM_elem_index_get(target);
01284 
01285     while (!BLI_heap_empty(heap)) {
01286         mednum = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_heap_popmin(heap));
01287         e = EDBM_edge_at_index(em, mednum);
01288 
01289         if (mednum == targetnum)
01290             break;
01291 
01292         if (BLI_smallhash_haskey(&visithash, (uintptr_t)e))
01293             continue;
01294 
01295         BLI_smallhash_insert(&visithash, (uintptr_t)e, NULL);
01296 
01297         edgetag_add_adjacent(em, &visithash, heap, mednum, BM_elem_index_get(e->v1), nedges, edges, prevedge, cost);
01298         edgetag_add_adjacent(em, &visithash, heap, mednum, BM_elem_index_get(e->v2), nedges, edges, prevedge, cost);
01299     }
01300     
01301     if (mednum == targetnum) {
01302         short allseams = 1;
01303 
01304         /* Check whether the path is already completely tagged.
01305          * if it is, the tags will be cleared instead of set. */
01306         mednum = targetnum;
01307         do {
01308             e = EDBM_edge_at_index(em, mednum);
01309             if (!edgetag_context_check(scene, em, e)) {
01310                 allseams = 0;
01311                 break;
01312             }
01313             mednum = prevedge[mednum];
01314         } while (mednum != BM_elem_index_get(source));
01315 
01316         /* Follow path back and source and add or remove tags */
01317         mednum = targetnum;
01318         do {
01319             e = EDBM_edge_at_index(em, mednum);
01320             if (allseams)
01321                 edgetag_context_set(em, scene, e, 0);
01322             else
01323                 edgetag_context_set(em, scene, e, 1);
01324             mednum = prevedge[mednum];
01325         } while (mednum != -1);
01326     }
01327 
01328     EDBM_index_arrays_free(em);
01329     MEM_freeN(nedges);
01330     MEM_freeN(edges);
01331     MEM_freeN(prevedge);
01332     MEM_freeN(cost);
01333     BLI_heap_free(heap, NULL);
01334     BLI_smallhash_release(&visithash);
01335 
01336     return 1;
01337 }
01338 
01339 /* ******************* mesh shortest path select, uses prev-selected edge ****************** */
01340 
01341 /* since you want to create paths with multiple selects, it doesn't have extend option */
01342 static int mouse_mesh_shortest_path(bContext *C, int mval[2])
01343 {
01344     ViewContext vc;
01345     BMEditMesh *em;
01346     BMEdge *e;
01347     int dist = 50;
01348     
01349     em_setup_viewcontext(C, &vc);
01350     vc.mval[0] = mval[0];
01351     vc.mval[1] = mval[1];
01352     em = vc.em;
01353     
01354     e = EDBM_edge_find_nearest(&vc, &dist);
01355     if (e) {
01356         Mesh *me = vc.obedit->data;
01357         int path = 0;
01358         
01359         if (em->bm->selected.last) {
01360             BMEditSelection *ese = em->bm->selected.last;
01361             
01362             if (ese && ese->htype == BM_EDGE) {
01363                 BMEdge *e_act;
01364                 e_act = (BMEdge *)ese->ele;
01365                 if (e_act != e) {
01366                     if (edgetag_shortest_path(vc.scene, em, e_act, e)) {
01367                         BM_select_history_remove(em->bm, e_act);
01368                         path = 1;
01369                     }
01370                 }
01371             }
01372         }
01373         if (path == 0) {
01374             int act = (edgetag_context_check(vc.scene, em, e) == 0);
01375             edgetag_context_set(em, vc.scene, e, act); /* switch the edge option */
01376         }
01377         
01378         EDBM_selectmode_flush(em);
01379 
01380         /* even if this is selected it may not be in the selection list */
01381         if (edgetag_context_check(vc.scene, em, e) == 0)
01382             BM_select_history_remove(em->bm, e);
01383         else
01384             BM_select_history_store(em->bm, e);
01385     
01386         /* force drawmode for mesh */
01387         switch (CTX_data_tool_settings(C)->edge_mode) {
01388             
01389             case EDGE_MODE_TAG_SEAM:
01390                 me->drawflag |= ME_DRAWSEAMS;
01391                 ED_uvedit_live_unwrap(vc.scene, vc.obedit);
01392                 break;
01393             case EDGE_MODE_TAG_SHARP:
01394                 me->drawflag |= ME_DRAWSHARP;
01395                 break;
01396             case EDGE_MODE_TAG_CREASE:  
01397                 me->drawflag |= ME_DRAWCREASES;
01398                 break;
01399             case EDGE_MODE_TAG_BEVEL:
01400                 me->drawflag |= ME_DRAWBWEIGHTS;
01401                 break;
01402         }
01403         
01404         EDBM_update_generic(C, em, FALSE);
01405 
01406         return TRUE;
01407     }
01408     else {
01409         return FALSE;
01410     }
01411 }
01412 
01413 
01414 static int edbm_shortest_path_select_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op), wmEvent *event)
01415 {
01416     
01417     view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
01418 
01419     if (mouse_mesh_shortest_path(C, event->mval)) {
01420         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01421     }
01422     else {
01423         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
01424     }
01425 }
01426 
01427 static int edbm_shortest_path_select_poll(bContext *C)
01428 {
01429     if (ED_operator_editmesh_region_view3d(C)) {
01430         Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
01431         BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
01432         return (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE) != 0;
01433     }
01434     return 0;
01435 }
01436 
01437 void MESH_OT_select_shortest_path(wmOperatorType *ot)
01438 {
01439     /* identifiers */
01440     ot->name = "Shortest Path Select";
01441     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_select_shortest_path";
01442     ot->description = "Select shortest path between two selections";
01443     
01444     /* api callbacks */
01445     ot->invoke = edbm_shortest_path_select_invoke;
01446     ot->poll = edbm_shortest_path_select_poll;
01447     
01448     /* flags */
01449     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
01450     
01451     /* properties */
01452     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 0, "Extend Select", "");
01453 }
01454 
01455 /* ************************************************** */
01456 /* here actual select happens */
01457 /* gets called via generic mouse select operator */
01458 int mouse_mesh(bContext *C, const int mval[2], short extend)
01459 {
01460     ViewContext vc;
01461     BMVert *eve = NULL;
01462     BMEdge *eed = NULL;
01463     BMFace *efa = NULL;
01464     
01465     /* setup view context for argument to callbacks */
01466     em_setup_viewcontext(C, &vc);
01467     vc.mval[0] = mval[0];
01468     vc.mval[1] = mval[1];
01469     
01470     if (unified_findnearest(&vc, &eve, &eed, &efa)) {
01471         
01472         if (extend == 0) EDBM_flag_disable_all(vc.em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
01473         
01474         if (efa) {
01475             /* set the last selected face */
01476             BM_active_face_set(vc.em->bm, efa);
01477             
01478             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
01479                 BM_select_history_store(vc.em->bm, efa);
01480                 BM_face_select_set(vc.em->bm, efa, TRUE);
01481             }
01482             else if (extend) {
01483                 BM_select_history_remove(vc.em->bm, efa);
01484                 BM_face_select_set(vc.em->bm, efa, FALSE);
01485             }
01486         }
01487         else if (eed) {
01488             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
01489                 BM_select_history_store(vc.em->bm, eed);
01490                 BM_edge_select_set(vc.em->bm, eed, TRUE);
01491             }
01492             else if (extend) {
01493                 BM_select_history_remove(vc.em->bm, eed);
01494                 BM_edge_select_set(vc.em->bm, eed, FALSE);
01495             }
01496         }
01497         else if (eve) {
01498             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
01499                 BM_select_history_store(vc.em->bm, eve);
01500                 BM_vert_select_set(vc.em->bm, eve, TRUE);
01501             }
01502             else if (extend) {
01503                 BM_select_history_remove(vc.em->bm, eve);
01504                 BM_vert_select_set(vc.em->bm, eve, FALSE);
01505             }
01506         }
01507         
01508         EDBM_selectmode_flush(vc.em);
01509           
01510         /* change active material on object */
01511         if (efa && efa->mat_nr != vc.obedit->actcol - 1) {
01512             vc.obedit->actcol = efa->mat_nr + 1;
01513             vc.em->mat_nr = efa->mat_nr;
01514 
01515             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MATERIAL|ND_SHADING, NULL);
01516 
01517         }
01518 
01519         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, vc.obedit);
01520         return 1;
01521     }
01522 
01523     return 0;
01524 }
01525 
01526 static void edbm_strip_selections(BMEditMesh *em)
01527 {
01528     BMEditSelection *ese, *nextese;
01529 
01530     if (!(em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX)) {
01531         ese = em->bm->selected.first;
01532         while (ese) {
01533             nextese = ese->next;
01534             if (ese->htype == BM_VERT) BLI_freelinkN(&(em->bm->selected), ese);
01535             ese = nextese;
01536         }
01537     }
01538     if (!(em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE)) {
01539         ese = em->bm->selected.first;
01540         while (ese) {
01541             nextese = ese->next;
01542             if (ese->htype == BM_EDGE) BLI_freelinkN(&(em->bm->selected), ese);
01543             ese = nextese;
01544         }
01545     }
01546     if (!(em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE)) {
01547         ese = em->bm->selected.first;
01548         while (ese) {
01549             nextese = ese->next;
01550             if (ese->htype == BM_FACE) BLI_freelinkN(&(em->bm->selected), ese);
01551             ese = nextese;
01552         }
01553     }
01554 }
01555 
01556 /* when switching select mode, makes sure selection is consistent for editing */
01557 /* also for paranoia checks to make sure edge or face mode works */
01558 void EDBM_selectmode_set(BMEditMesh *em)
01559 {
01560     BMVert *eve;
01561     BMEdge *eed;
01562     BMFace *efa;
01563     BMIter iter;
01564     
01565     em->bm->selectmode = em->selectmode;
01566 
01567     edbm_strip_selections(em); /* strip BMEditSelections from em->selected that are not relevant to new mode */
01568     
01569     if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
01570         EDBM_select_flush(em);
01571     }
01572     else if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
01573         /* deselect vertices, and select again based on edge select */
01574         eve = BM_iter_new(&iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
01575         for (; eve; eve = BM_iter_step(&iter)) BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, eve, FALSE);
01576         
01577         eed = BM_iter_new(&iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL);
01578         for (; eed; eed = BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
01579             if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
01580                 BM_edge_select_set(em->bm, eed, TRUE);
01581             }
01582         }
01583         
01584         /* selects faces based on edge status */
01585         EDBM_selectmode_flush(em);
01586     }
01587     else if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
01588         /* deselect eges, and select again based on face select */
01589         eed = BM_iter_new(&iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL);
01590         for (; eed; eed = BM_iter_step(&iter)) BM_edge_select_set(em->bm, eed, FALSE);
01591         
01592         efa = BM_iter_new(&iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, NULL);
01593         for (; efa; efa = BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
01594             if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
01595                 BM_face_select_set(em->bm, efa, TRUE);
01596             }
01597         }
01598     }
01599 }
01600 
01601 void EDBM_selectmode_convert(BMEditMesh *em, short oldmode, short selectmode)
01602 {
01603     BMEdge *eed;
01604     BMFace *efa;
01605     BMIter iter;
01606 
01607     /* have to find out what the selectionmode was previously */
01608     if (oldmode == SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
01609         if (selectmode == SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
01610             /* select all edges associated with every selected vertex */
01611             eed = BM_iter_new(&iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL);
01612             for (; eed; eed = BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
01613                 if ((BM_elem_flag_test(eed->v1, BM_ELEM_SELECT) ||
01614                      BM_elem_flag_test(eed->v2, BM_ELEM_SELECT)))
01615                 {
01616                     BM_edge_select_set(em->bm, eed, TRUE);
01617                 }
01618             }
01619         }       
01620         else if (selectmode == SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
01621             BMIter liter;
01622             BMLoop *l;
01623 
01624             /* select all faces associated with every selected vertex */
01625             efa = BM_iter_new(&iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, NULL);
01626             for (; efa; efa = BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
01627                 l = BM_iter_new(&liter, em->bm, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, efa);
01628                 for (; l; l = BM_iter_step(&liter)) {
01629                     if (BM_elem_flag_test(l->v, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
01630                         BM_face_select_set(em->bm, efa, TRUE);
01631                         break;
01632                     }
01633                 }
01634             }
01635         }
01636     }
01637     
01638     if (oldmode == SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
01639         if (selectmode == SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
01640             BMIter liter;
01641             BMLoop *l;
01642 
01643             /* select all faces associated with every selected vertex */
01644             efa = BM_iter_new(&iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, NULL);
01645             for (; efa; efa = BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
01646                 l = BM_iter_new(&liter, em->bm, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, efa);
01647                 for (; l; l = BM_iter_step(&liter)) {
01648                     if (BM_elem_flag_test(l->v, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
01649                         BM_face_select_set(em->bm, efa, TRUE);
01650                         break;
01651                     }
01652                 }
01653             }
01654         }
01655     }
01656 }
01657 
01658 
01659 void EDBM_deselect_by_material(BMEditMesh *em, const short index, const short select)
01660 {
01661     BMIter iter;
01662     BMFace *efa;
01663 
01664     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01665         if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN))
01666             continue;
01667         if (efa->mat_nr == index) {
01668             BM_face_select_set(em->bm, efa, select);
01669         }
01670     }
01671 }
01672 
01673 void EDBM_select_toggle_all(BMEditMesh *em) /* exported for UV */
01674 {
01675     if (em->bm->totvertsel || em->bm->totedgesel || em->bm->totfacesel)
01676         EDBM_flag_disable_all(em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
01677     else
01678         EDBM_flag_enable_all(em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
01679 }
01680 
01681 void EDBM_select_swap(BMEditMesh *em) /* exported for UV */
01682 {
01683     BMIter iter;
01684     BMVert *eve;
01685     BMEdge *eed;
01686     BMFace *efa;
01687     
01688     if (em->bm->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
01689         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
01690             if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN))
01691                 continue;
01692             BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, eve, !BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT));
01693         }
01694     }
01695     else if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
01696         BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
01697             if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN))
01698                 continue;
01699             BM_edge_select_set(em->bm, eed, !BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT));
01700         }
01701     }
01702     else {
01703         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01704             if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN))
01705                 continue;
01706             BM_face_select_set(em->bm, efa, !BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT));
01707         }
01708 
01709     }
01710 //  if (EM_texFaceCheck())
01711 }
01712 
01713 int EDBM_select_interior_faces(BMEditMesh *em)
01714 {
01715     BMesh *bm = em->bm;
01716     BMIter iter;
01717     BMIter eiter;
01718     BMFace *efa;
01719     BMEdge *eed;
01720     int ok;
01721     int change = FALSE;
01722 
01723     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01724         if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN))
01725             continue;
01726 
01727 
01728         ok = TRUE;
01729         BM_ITER_ELEM (eed, &eiter, efa, BM_EDGES_OF_FACE) {
01730             if (BM_edge_face_count(eed) < 3) {
01731                 ok = FALSE;
01732                 break;
01733             }
01734         }
01735 
01736         if (ok) {
01737             BM_face_select_set(bm, efa, TRUE);
01738             change = TRUE;
01739         }
01740     }
01741 
01742     return change;
01743 }
01744 
01745 static void linked_limit_default(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01746 {
01747     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "limit")) {
01748         Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
01749         BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
01750         if (em->selectmode == SCE_SELECT_FACE)
01751             RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "limit", TRUE);
01752         else
01753             RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "limit", FALSE);
01754     }
01755 }
01756 
01757 static int edbm_select_linked_pick_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
01758 {
01759     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
01760     ViewContext vc;
01761     BMesh *bm;
01762     BMWalker walker;
01763     BMEditMesh *em;
01764     BMVert *eve;
01765     BMEdge *e, *eed;
01766     BMFace *efa;
01767     int sel = !RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "deselect");
01768 
01769     int limit;
01770 
01771     linked_limit_default(C, op);
01772 
01773     limit = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "limit");
01774 
01775     /* unified_finednearest needs ogl */
01776     view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
01777     
01778     /* setup view context for argument to callbacks */
01779     em_setup_viewcontext(C, &vc);
01780     em = vc.em;
01781 
01782     if (em->bm->totedge == 0)
01783         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01784     
01785     bm = em->bm;
01786 
01787     vc.mval[0] = event->mval[0];
01788     vc.mval[1] = event->mval[1];
01789     
01790     /* return warning! */
01791     
01792     if (unified_findnearest(&vc, &eve, &eed, &efa) == 0) {
01793         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit);
01794     
01795         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01796     }
01797     
01798     if (em->selectmode == SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
01799         BMIter iter;
01800 
01801         if (efa == NULL)
01802             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01803 
01804         if (limit) {
01805             /* hflag no-seam --> bmo-tag */
01806             BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
01807                 /* BMESH_TODO, don't use 'BM_ELEM_SELECT' here, its a HFLAG only! */
01808                 BMO_elem_flag_set(bm, e, BM_ELEM_SELECT, !BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_SEAM));
01809             }
01810         }
01811 
01812         /* walk */
01813         BMW_init(&walker, bm, BMW_ISLAND,
01814                  BMW_MASK_NOP, limit ? BM_ELEM_SELECT : BMW_MASK_NOP, BMW_MASK_NOP,
01815                  BMW_FLAG_TEST_HIDDEN,
01816                  BMW_NIL_LAY);
01817 
01818         e = BMW_begin(&walker, efa);
01819         for (; efa; efa = BMW_step(&walker)) {
01820             BM_face_select_set(bm, efa, sel);
01821         }
01822         BMW_end(&walker);
01823     }
01824     else {
01825         if (efa) {
01826             eed = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(efa)->e;
01827         }
01828         else if (!eed) {
01829             if (!eve || !eve->e)
01830                 return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01831 
01832             eed = eve->e;
01833         }
01834 
01835         BMW_init(&walker, bm, BMW_SHELL,
01836                  BMW_MASK_NOP, BMW_MASK_NOP, BMW_MASK_NOP,
01837                  BMW_FLAG_TEST_HIDDEN,
01838                  BMW_NIL_LAY);
01839 
01840         e = BMW_begin(&walker, eed->v1);
01841         for (; e; e = BMW_step(&walker)) {
01842             BM_edge_select_set(bm, e, sel);
01843         }
01844         BMW_end(&walker);
01845 
01846         BM_mesh_select_mode_flush(bm);
01847     }
01848 
01849     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit);
01850     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01851 }
01852 
01853 void MESH_OT_select_linked_pick(wmOperatorType *ot)
01854 {
01855     /* identifiers */
01856     ot->name = "Select Linked";
01857     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_select_linked_pick";
01858     ot->description = "(De)select all vertices linked to the edge under the mouse cursor";
01859     
01860     /* api callbacks */
01861     ot->invoke = edbm_select_linked_pick_invoke;
01862     ot->poll = ED_operator_editmesh;
01863     
01864     /* flags */
01865     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
01866     
01867     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "deselect", 0, "Deselect", "");
01868     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "limit", 0, "Limit by Seams", "");

01870 
01871 
01872 static int edbm_select_linked_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01873 {
01874     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
01875     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
01876     BMesh *bm = em->bm;
01877     BMIter iter;
01878     BMVert *v;
01879     BMEdge *e;
01880     BMWalker walker;
01881 
01882     int limit;
01883 
01884     linked_limit_default(C, op);
01885 
01886     limit = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "limit");
01887 
01888     if (em->selectmode == SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
01889         BMFace *efa;
01890 
01891         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01892             BM_elem_flag_set(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG, (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT) &&
01893                                                 !BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)));
01894         }
01895 
01896         if (limit) {
01897             BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
01898                 /* BMESH_TODO, don't use 'BM_ELEM_SELECT' here, its a HFLAG only! */
01899                 BMO_elem_flag_set(bm, e, BM_ELEM_SELECT, !BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_SEAM));
01900             }
01901         }
01902 
01903         BMW_init(&walker, bm, BMW_ISLAND,
01904                  BMW_MASK_NOP, limit ? BM_ELEM_SELECT : BMW_MASK_NOP, BMW_MASK_NOP,
01905                  BMW_FLAG_TEST_HIDDEN,
01906                  BMW_NIL_LAY);
01907 
01908         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01909             if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
01910                 e = BMW_begin(&walker, efa);
01911                 for (; efa; efa = BMW_step(&walker)) {
01912                     BM_face_select_set(bm, efa, TRUE);
01913                 }
01914             }
01915         }
01916         BMW_end(&walker);
01917     }
01918     else {
01919         BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
01920             if (BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
01921                 BM_elem_flag_enable(v, BM_ELEM_TAG);
01922             }
01923             else {
01924                 BM_elem_flag_disable(v, BM_ELEM_TAG);
01925             }
01926         }
01927 
01928         BMW_init(&walker, em->bm, BMW_SHELL,
01929                  BMW_MASK_NOP, BMW_MASK_NOP, BMW_MASK_NOP,
01930                  BMW_FLAG_TEST_HIDDEN,
01931                  BMW_NIL_LAY);
01932 
01933         BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
01934             if (BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
01935                 e = BMW_begin(&walker, v);
01936                 for (; e; e = BMW_step(&walker)) {
01937                     BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, e->v1, TRUE);
01938                     BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, e->v2, TRUE);
01939                 }
01940             }
01941         }
01942         BMW_end(&walker);
01943     }
01944     EDBM_selectmode_flush_ex(em, SCE_SELECT_VERTEX);
01945 
01946     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit);
01947 
01948     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01949 }

01996 static int edbm_select_less_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01997 {
01998     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
01999     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02000 
02001     EDBM_select_less(em);
02002 
02003     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit);
02004     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02005 }
02006 
02007 void MESH_OT_select_less(wmOperatorType *ot)
02008 {
02009     /* identifiers */
02010     ot->name = "Select Less";
02011     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_select_less";
02012     ot->description = "Deselect vertices, edges or faces at the boundary of each selection region";
02013 
02014     /* api callbacks */
02015     ot->exec = edbm_select_less_exec;
02016     ot->poll = ED_operator_editmesh;
02017     
02018     /* flags */
02019     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02020 }
02021 
02022 /* Walk all reachable elements of the same type as h_act in breadth-first
02023  * order, starting from h_act. Deselects elements if the depth when they
02024  * are reached is not a multiple of "nth". */
02025 static void walker_deselect_nth(BMEditMesh *em, int nth, int offset, BMHeader *h_act)
02026 {
02027     BMElem *ele;
02028     BMesh *bm = em->bm;
02029     BMWalker walker;
02030     BMIter iter;
02031     int walktype = 0, itertype = 0, flushtype = 0;
02032     short mask_vert = 0, mask_edge = 0, mask_face = 0;
02033 
02034     /* No active element from which to start - nothing to do */
02035     if (h_act == NULL) {
02036         return;
02037     }
02038 
02039     /* Determine which type of iter, walker, and select flush to use
02040      * based on type of the elements being deselected */
02041     switch (h_act->htype) {
02042         case BM_VERT:
02043             itertype = BM_VERTS_OF_MESH;
02044             walktype = BMW_CONNECTED_VERTEX;
02045             flushtype = SCE_SELECT_VERTEX;
02046             mask_vert = BM_ELEM_SELECT;
02047             break;
02048         case BM_EDGE:
02049             itertype = BM_EDGES_OF_MESH;
02050             walktype = BMW_SHELL;
02051             flushtype = SCE_SELECT_EDGE;
02052             mask_edge = BM_ELEM_SELECT;
02053             break;
02054         case BM_FACE:
02055             itertype = BM_FACES_OF_MESH;
02056             walktype = BMW_ISLAND;
02057             flushtype = SCE_SELECT_FACE;
02058             mask_face = BM_ELEM_SELECT;
02059             break;
02060     }
02061 
02062     /* Walker restrictions uses BMO flags, not header flags,
02063      * so transfer BM_ELEM_SELECT from HFlags onto a BMO flag layer. */
02064     BMO_push(bm, NULL);
02065     BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, itertype) {
02066         if (BM_elem_flag_test(ele, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
02067             /* BMESH_TODO, don't use 'BM_ELEM_SELECT' here, its a HFLAG only! */
02068             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, (BMElemF *)ele, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
02069         }
02070     }
02071 
02072     /* Walk over selected elements starting at active */
02073     BMW_init(&walker, bm, walktype,
02074              mask_vert, mask_edge, mask_face,
02075              BMW_FLAG_NOP, /* don't use BMW_FLAG_TEST_HIDDEN here since we want to desel all */
02076              BMW_NIL_LAY);
02077 
02078     BLI_assert(walker.order == BMW_BREADTH_FIRST);
02079     for (ele = BMW_begin(&walker, h_act); ele != NULL; ele = BMW_step(&walker)) {
02080         /* Deselect elements that aren't at "nth" depth from active */
02081         if ((offset + BMW_current_depth(&walker)) % nth) {
02082             BM_elem_select_set(bm, ele, FALSE);
02083         }
02084     }
02085     BMW_end(&walker);
02086 
02087     BMO_pop(bm);
02088 
02089     /* Flush selection up */
02090     EDBM_selectmode_flush_ex(em, flushtype);
02091 }
02092 
02093 static void deselect_nth_active(BMEditMesh *em, BMVert **r_eve, BMEdge **r_eed, BMFace **r_efa)
02094 {
02095     BMVert *v;
02096     BMEdge *e;
02097     BMFace *f;
02098     BMIter iter;
02099     BMEditSelection *ese;
02100 
02101     *r_eve = NULL;
02102     *r_eed = NULL;
02103     *r_efa = NULL;
02104 
02105     EDBM_selectmode_flush(em);
02106     ese = (BMEditSelection *)em->bm->selected.last;
02107 
02108     if (ese) {
02109         switch (ese->htype) {
02110             case BM_VERT:
02111                 *r_eve = (BMVert *)ese->ele;
02112                 return;
02113             case BM_EDGE:
02114                 *r_eed = (BMEdge *)ese->ele;
02115                 return;
02116             case BM_FACE:
02117                 *r_efa = (BMFace *)ese->ele;
02118                 return;
02119         }
02120     }
02121 
02122     if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
02123         BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
02124             if (BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
02125                 *r_eve = v;
02126                 return;
02127             }
02128         }
02129     }
02130     else if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
02131         BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
02132             if (BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
02133                 *r_eed = e;
02134                 return;
02135             }
02136         }
02137     }
02138     else if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
02139         f = BM_active_face_get(em->bm, TRUE);
02140         if (f) {
02141             *r_efa = f;
02142             return;
02143         }
02144     }
02145 }
02146 
02147 static int edbm_deselect_nth(BMEditMesh *em, int nth, int offset)
02148 {
02149     BMVert *v;
02150     BMEdge *e;
02151     BMFace *f;
02152 
02153     deselect_nth_active(em, &v, &e, &f);
02154 
02155     if (v) {
02156         walker_deselect_nth(em, nth, offset, &v->head);
02157         return 1;
02158     }
02159     else if (e) {
02160         walker_deselect_nth(em, nth, offset, &e->head);
02161         return 1;
02162     }
02163     else if (f) {
02164         walker_deselect_nth(em, nth, offset, &f->head);
02165         return 1;
02166     }
02167 
02168     return 0;
02169 }
02170 
02171 static int edbm_select_nth_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02172 {
02173     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02174     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02175     int nth = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "nth");
02176     int offset = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "offset");
02177 
02178     offset = MIN2(nth, offset);
02179 
02180     if (edbm_deselect_nth(em, nth, offset) == 0) {
02181         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Mesh has no active vert/edge/face");
02182         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02183     }
02184 
02185     EDBM_update_generic(C, em, FALSE);
02186 
02187     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02188 }
02189

02207 }

02228 
02229 static int edbm_select_sharp_edges_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02230 {
02231     /* Find edges that have exactly two neighboring faces,
02232      * check the angle between those faces, and if angle is
02233      * small enough, select the edge
02234      */
02235     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02236     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02237     BMIter iter;
02238     BMEdge *e;
02239     BMLoop *l1, *l2;
02240     float sharp = RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "sharpness"), angle;
02241 
02242     sharp = DEG2RADF(sharp);
02243 
02244     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
02245         if (BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) || !e->l)
02246             continue;
02247 
02248         l1 = e->l;
02249         l2 = l1->radial_next;
02250 
02251         if (l1 == l2)
02252             continue;
02253 
02254         /* edge has exactly two neighboring faces, check angle */
02255         angle = angle_normalized_v3v3(l1->f->no, l2->f->no);
02256 
02257         if (fabsf(angle) > sharp) {
02258             BM_edge_select_set(em->bm, e, TRUE);
02259         }
02260 
02261     }
02262 
02263     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
02264 
02265     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02266 }
02267 
02268 void MESH_OT_edges_select_sharp(wmOperatorType *ot)
02269 {
02270     /* identifiers */
02271     ot->name = "Select Sharp Edges";
02272     ot->description = "Marked selected edges as sharp";
02273     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_edges_select_sharp";
02274     
02275     /* api callbacks */
02276     ot->exec = edbm_select_sharp_edges_exec;
02277     ot->poll = ED_operator_editmesh;
02278     
02279     /* flags */
02280     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02281     
02282     /* props */
02283     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "sharpness", 1.0f, 0.01f, FLT_MAX, "sharpness", "", 1.0f, 180.0f);
02284 }
02285 
02286 static int edbm_select_linked_flat_faces_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02287 {
02288     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02289     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02290     BMIter iter, liter, liter2;
02291     BMFace *f, **stack = NULL;
02292     BLI_array_declare(stack);
02293     BMLoop *l, *l2;
02294     float sharp = RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "sharpness");
02295     int i;
02296 
02297     sharp = (sharp * M_PI) / 180.0;
02298 
02299     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02300         BM_elem_flag_disable(f, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02301     }
02302 
02303     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02304         if (BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) || !BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_SELECT) || BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_TAG))
02305             continue;
02306 
02307         BLI_array_empty(stack);
02308         i = 1;
02309 
02310         BLI_array_growone(stack);
02311         stack[i - 1] = f;
02312 
02313         while (i) {
02314             f = stack[i - 1];
02315             i--;
02316 
02317             BM_face_select_set(em->bm, f, TRUE);
02318 
02319             BM_elem_flag_enable(f, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02320 
02321             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02322                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l2, &liter2, l, BM_LOOPS_OF_LOOP) {
02323                     float angle;
02324 
02325                     if (BM_elem_flag_test(l2->f, BM_ELEM_TAG) || BM_elem_flag_test(l2->f, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN))
02326                         continue;
02327 
02328                     /* edge has exactly two neighboring faces, check angle */
02329                     angle = angle_normalized_v3v3(f->no, l2->f->no);
02330 
02331                     /* invalidate: edge too sharp */
02332                     if (angle < sharp) {
02333                         BLI_array_growone(stack);
02334                         stack[i] = l2->f;
02335                         i++;
02336                     }
02337                 }
02338             }
02339         }
02340     }
02341 
02342     BLI_array_free(stack);
02343 
02344     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
02345 
02346     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02347 }
02348 
02349 void MESH_OT_faces_select_linked_flat(wmOperatorType *ot)
02350 {
02351     /* identifiers */
02352     ot->name = "Select Linked Flat Faces";
02353     ot->description = "Select linked faces by angle";
02354     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_faces_select_linked_flat";
02355     
02356     /* api callbacks */
02357     ot->exec = edbm_select_linked_flat_faces_exec;
02358     ot->poll = ED_operator_editmesh;
02359     
02360     /* flags */
02361     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02362     
02363     /* props */
02364     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "sharpness", 1.0f, 0.01f, FLT_MAX, "sharpness", "", 1.0f, 180.0f);
02365 }
02366 
02367 static int edbm_select_non_manifold_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02368 {
02369     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02370     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02371     BMVert *v;
02372     BMEdge *e;
02373     BMIter iter;
02374 
02375     /* Selects isolated verts, and edges that do not have 2 neighboring
02376      * faces
02377      */
02378     
02379     if (em->selectmode == SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
02380         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Doesn't work in face selection mode");
02381         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02382     }
02383     
02384     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
02385         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) && !BM_vert_is_manifold(v)) {
02386             BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, v, TRUE);
02387         }
02388     }
02389     
02390     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
02391         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) && !BM_edge_is_manifold(e)) {
02392             BM_edge_select_set(em->bm, e, TRUE);
02393         }
02394     }
02395 
02396     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
02397 
02398     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02399 }
02400
