02415 
02416 static int edbm_select_random_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02417 {
02418     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02419     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02420     BMVert *eve;
02421     BMEdge *eed;
02422     BMFace *efa;
02423     BMIter iter;
02424     float randfac =  RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "percent") / 100.0f;
02425 
02426     BLI_srand(BLI_rand()); /* random seed */
02427     
02428     if (!RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend"))
02429         EDBM_flag_disable_all(em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
02430 
02431     if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
02432         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
02433             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) && BLI_frand() < randfac) {
02434                 BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, eve, TRUE);
02435             }
02436         }
02437         EDBM_selectmode_flush(em);
02438     }
02439     else if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
02440         BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
02441             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) && BLI_frand() < randfac) {
02442                 BM_edge_select_set(em->bm, eed, TRUE);
02443             }
02444         }
02445         EDBM_selectmode_flush(em);
02446     }
02447     else {
02448         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02449             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) && BLI_frand() < randfac) {
02450                 BM_face_select_set(em->bm, efa, TRUE);
02451             }
02452         }
02453         EDBM_selectmode_flush(em);
02454     }
02455     
02456     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
02457     
02458     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02459 }
02460 
02461 void MESH_OT_select_random(wmOperatorType *ot)
02462 {
02463     /* identifiers */
02464     ot->name = "Select Random";
02465     ot->description = "Randomly select vertices";
02466     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_select_random";
02467 
02468     /* api callbacks */
02469     ot->exec = edbm_select_random_exec;
02470     ot->poll = ED_operator_editmesh;
02471 
02472     /* flags */
02473     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02474     
02475     /* props */
02476     RNA_def_float_percentage(ot->srna, "percent", 50.f, 0.0f, 100.0f,
02477                              "Percent", "Percentage of elements to select randomly", 0.f, 100.0f);
02478     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 0,
02479                     "Extend Selection", "Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first");
02480 }
02481 
02482 static int edbm_select_next_loop_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
02483 {
02484     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02485     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02486     BMFace *f;
02487     BMVert *v;
02488     BMIter iter;
02489     
02490     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
02491         BM_elem_flag_disable(v, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02492     }
02493     
02494     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02495         BMLoop *l;
02496         BMIter liter;
02497         
02498         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02499             if (BM_elem_flag_test(l->v, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
02500                 BM_elem_flag_enable(l->next->v, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02501                 BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, l->v, FALSE);
02502             }
02503         }
02504     }
02505 
02506     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
02507         if (BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
02508             BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, v, TRUE);
02509         }
02510     }
02511 
02512     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit);
02513     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02514 }

02528     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;

02531 
02532 static int edbm_region_to_loop_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
02533 {
02534     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02535     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02536     BMFace *f;
02537     BMEdge *e;
02538     BMIter iter;
02539 
02540     BM_mesh_elem_hflag_disable_all(em->bm, BM_EDGE, BM_ELEM_TAG, FALSE);
02541 
02542     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02543         BMLoop *l1, *l2;
02544         BMIter liter1, liter2;
02545         
02546         BM_ITER_ELEM (l1, &liter1, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02547             int tot = 0, totsel = 0;
02548             
02549             BM_ITER_ELEM (l2, &liter2, l1->e, BM_LOOPS_OF_EDGE) {
02550                 tot++;
02551                 totsel += BM_elem_flag_test(l2->f, BM_ELEM_SELECT) != 0;
02552             }
02553             
02554             if ((tot != totsel && totsel > 0) || (totsel == 1 && tot == 1))
02555                 BM_elem_flag_enable(l1->e, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02556         }
02557     }
02558 
02559     EDBM_flag_disable_all(em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
02560     
02561     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
02562         if (BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
02563             BM_edge_select_set(em->bm, e, TRUE);
02564         }
02565     }
02566 
02567     /* If in face-only select mode, switch to edge select mode so that
02568      * an edge-only selection is not inconsistent state */
02569     if (em->selectmode == SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
02570         em->selectmode = SCE_SELECT_EDGE;
02571         EDBM_selectmode_set(em);
02572         EDBM_selectmode_to_scene(C);
02573     }
02574 
02575     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
02576 
02577     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02578 }
02579 
02580 void MESH_OT_region_to_loop(wmOperatorType *ot)
02581 {
02582     /* identifiers */
02583     ot->name = "Select Boundary Loop";
02584     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_region_to_loop";
02585     ot->description = "Select boundary edges around the selected faces";
02586 
02587     /* api callbacks */
02588     ot->exec = edbm_region_to_loop_exec;
02589     ot->poll = ED_operator_editmesh;
02590 
02591     /* flags */
02592     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02593 }
02594 
02595 static int loop_find_region(BMLoop *l, int flag,
02596                             SmallHash *fhash, BMFace ***region_out)
02597 {
02598     BLI_array_declare(region);
02599     BLI_array_declare(stack);
02600     BMFace **region = NULL;
02601     BMFace **stack = NULL;
02602     BMFace *f;
02603     
02604     BLI_array_append(stack, l->f);
02605     BLI_smallhash_insert(fhash, (uintptr_t)l->f, NULL);
02606     
02607     while (BLI_array_count(stack) > 0) {
02608         BMIter liter1, liter2;
02609         BMLoop *l1, *l2;
02610         
02611         f = BLI_array_pop(stack);
02612         BLI_array_append(region, f);
02613         
02614         BM_ITER_ELEM (l1, &liter1, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02615             if (BM_elem_flag_test(l1->e, flag))
02616                 continue;
02617             
02618             BM_ITER_ELEM (l2, &liter2, l1->e, BM_LOOPS_OF_EDGE) {
02619                 if (BLI_smallhash_haskey(fhash, (uintptr_t)l2->f))
02620                     continue;
02621                 
02622                 BLI_array_append(stack, l2->f);
02623                 BLI_smallhash_insert(fhash, (uintptr_t)l2->f, NULL);
02624             }
02625         }
02626     }
02627     
02628     BLI_array_free(stack);
02629     
02630     *region_out = region;
02631     return BLI_array_count(region);
02632 }
02633 
02634 static int verg_radial(const void *va, const void *vb)
02635 {
02636     BMEdge *e1 = *((void **)va);
02637     BMEdge *e2 = *((void **)vb);
02638     int a, b;
02639     
02640     a = BM_edge_face_count(e1);
02641     b = BM_edge_face_count(e2);
02642     
02643     if (a > b)  return -1;
02644     if (a == b) return  0;
02645     if (a < b)  return  1;
02646     
02647     return -1;
02648 }
02649 
02650 static int loop_find_regions(BMEditMesh *em, int selbigger)
02651 {
02652     SmallHash visithash;
02653     BMIter iter;
02654     BMEdge *e, **edges = NULL;
02655     BLI_array_declare(edges);
02656     BMFace *f;
02657     int count = 0, i;
02658     
02659     BLI_smallhash_init(&visithash);
02660     
02661     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02662         BM_elem_flag_disable(f, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02663     }
02664 
02665     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
02666         if (BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
02667             BLI_array_append(edges, e);
02668             BM_elem_flag_enable(e, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02669         }
02670         else {
02671             BM_elem_flag_disable(e, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02672         }
02673     }
02674     
02675     /* sort edges by radial cycle length */
02676     qsort(edges,  BLI_array_count(edges), sizeof(void *), verg_radial);
02677     
02678     for (i = 0; i < BLI_array_count(edges); i++) {
02679         BMIter liter;
02680         BMLoop *l;
02681         BMFace **region = NULL, **region_out;
02682         int c, tot = 0;
02683         
02684         e = edges[i];
02685         
02686         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_TAG))
02687             continue;
02688         
02689         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, e, BM_LOOPS_OF_EDGE) {
02690             if (BLI_smallhash_haskey(&visithash, (uintptr_t)l->f))
02691                 continue;
02692                         
02693             c = loop_find_region(l, BM_ELEM_SELECT, &visithash, &region_out);
02694 
02695             if (!region || (selbigger ? c >= tot : c < tot)) {
02696                 /* this region is the best seen so far */
02697                 tot = c;
02698                 if (region) {
02699                     /* free the previous best */
02700                     MEM_freeN(region);
02701                 }
02702                 /* track the current region as the new best */
02703                 region = region_out;
02704             }
02705             else {
02706                 /* this region is not as good as best so far, just free it */
02707                 MEM_freeN(region_out);
02708             }
02709         }
02710         
02711         if (region) {
02712             int j;
02713             
02714             for (j = 0; j < tot; j++) {
02715                 BM_elem_flag_enable(region[j], BM_ELEM_TAG);
02716                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, region[j], BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02717                     BM_elem_flag_disable(l->e, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02718                 }
02719             }
02720             
02721             count += tot;
02722             
02723             MEM_freeN(region);
02724         }
02725     }
02726     
02727     BLI_array_free(edges);
02728     BLI_smallhash_release(&visithash);
02729     
02730     return count;
02731 }
02732 
02733 static int edbm_loop_to_region_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02734 {
02735     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02736     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02737     BMIter iter;
02738     BMFace *f;
02739     int selbigger = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "select_bigger");
02740     int a, b;
02741 
02742     /* find the set of regions with smallest number of total faces */
02743     a = loop_find_regions(em, selbigger);
02744     b = loop_find_regions(em, !selbigger);
02745     
02746     if ((a <= b) ^ selbigger) {
02747         loop_find_regions(em, selbigger);
02748     }
02749     
02750     EDBM_flag_disable_all(em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
02751     
02752     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02753         if (BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_TAG) && !BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
02754             BM_face_select_set(em->bm, f, TRUE);
02755         }
02756     }
02757     
02758     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
02759     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02760 }
02761 
02762 void MESH_OT_loop_to_region(wmOperatorType *ot)
02763 {
02764     /* identifiers */
02765     ot->name = "Select Loop Inner-Region";
02766     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_loop_to_region";
02767     ot->description = "Select region of faces inside of a selected loop of edges";
02768 
02769     /* api callbacks */
02770     ot->exec = edbm_loop_to_region_exec;
02771     ot->poll = ED_operator_editmesh;
02772 
02773     /* flags */
02774     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02775     
02776     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "select_bigger", 0, "Select Bigger", "Select bigger regions instead of smaller ones");
02777 }
